39 // Class CapsuleShape
49 class CapsuleShape : public ConvexShape {
50 
51  protected :
52 
53  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
54 
56  decimal mHalfHeight;
57 
58  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
59 
61  virtual Vector3 getLocalSupportPointWithoutMargin(const Vector3& direction) const override;
62 
64  virtual bool testPointInside(const Vector3& localPoint, ProxyShape* proxyShape) const override;
65 
67  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, ProxyShape* proxyShape, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
68 
70  bool raycastWithSphereEndCap(const Vector3& point1, const Vector3& point2,
71  const Vector3& sphereCenter, decimal maxFraction,
72  Vector3& hitLocalPoint, decimal& hitFraction) const;
73 
75  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
76 
77  public :
78 
79  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
80 
82  CapsuleShape(decimal radius, decimal height);
83 
85  virtual ~CapsuleShape() override = default;
86 
88  CapsuleShape(const CapsuleShape& shape) = delete;
89 
91  CapsuleShape& operator=(const CapsuleShape& shape) = delete;
92 
94  decimal getRadius() const;
95 
97  decimal getHeight() const;
98

101 
103  virtual bool isPolyhedron() const override;
104 
106  virtual void computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const override;
107 
109  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
110 };
111 
112 // Get the radius of the capsule
116 inline decimal CapsuleShape::getRadius() const {
117  return mMargin;
118 }
119 
120 // Return the height of the capsule
124 inline decimal CapsuleShape::getHeight() const {
125  return mHalfHeight + mHalfHeight;
126 }
127 
128 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
129 inline size_t CapsuleShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
130  return sizeof(CapsuleShape);
131 }
132 
133 // Return the local bounds of the shape in x, y and z directions
134 // This method is used to compute the AABB of the box
139 inline void CapsuleShape::getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const {
140 
141  // Maximum bounds
142  max.x = mMargin;
143  max.y = mHalfHeight + mMargin;
144  max.z = mMargin;
145 
146  // Minimum bounds
147  min.x = -mMargin;
148  min.y = -max.y;
149  min.z = min.x;
150 }
151 
152 // Return true if the collision shape is a polyhedron
153 inline bool CapsuleShape::isPolyhedron() const {
154  return false;
155 }
156 
157 // Return a local support point in a given direction without the object margin.
164 inline Vector3 CapsuleShape::getLocalSupportPointWithoutMargin(const Vector3& direction) const {
165 
166  // Support point top sphere
167  decimal dotProductTop = mHalfHeight * direction.y;
168 
169  // Support point bottom sphere
170  decimal dotProductBottom = -mHalfHeight * direction.y;
171 
172  // Return the point with the maximum dot product
173  if (dotProductTop > dotProductBottom) {
174  return Vector3(0, mHalfHeight, 0);
175  }
176  else {
177  return Vector3(0, -mHalfHeight, 0);
178  }
179 }
180 
181 // Return the string representation of the shape
182 inline std::string CapsuleShape::to_string() const {
183  return "CapsuleShape{halfHeight=" + std::to_string(mHalfHeight) + ", radius=" + std::to_string(getRadius()) + "}";
184 }
185 
186 }
187
